document.full_text: the father of teen idol miley cyrus is dropping divorce plans, and says he no longer feels that her disney channel tv show "hannah montana" ripped his family apart.
document.title: miley's dad drops divorce, loves "hannah montana"
lines_and_colors: the father of teen idol miley cyrus is dropping divorce plans, and says he no longer feels that her disney channel tv show "hannah montana" ripped his family apart.
